instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00165: What is 820-00165? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.SMC_ONOFF: What is SMC_ONOFF? SMC_ONOFF is a signal that tells the machine that the power button has been pressed so it knows to turn on, or turn off. .
definitions.PPBUS_G3H: What is PPBUS_G3H? Main system power rail that charges the battery, or is power from the battery, that everything else is powered from. .
definitions.SMC_RESET_L: What is SMC_RESET_L? SMC_RESET_L puts the SMC into reset mode when it is low, _L means the signal is present when voltage is low. The SMC being in reset mode keeps it from running..
definitions.3V42_G3H: What is 3V42_G3H? This is shorthand for PP3V42_G3H which is one of the first power rails that must turn on in older Macbooks that use a magsafe charger in order for them to get a light on the charger. This power rail powers the onewire circuit and the SMC, which are necessary for the machine to communicate with the charger and get it to turn on, as well as begin the bootup sequence. .

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a, shut down by itself after boot starts
threads.message: i think This is liquid damaged  There is no visible corrosion or damaged as I cheked with microscope. board is pretty clean. cheked only with dc in board and fan same out come.  takes 12 secnds to get the chime i Disconnected keyboard? Check <SIGNAL>SMC_ONOFF</SIGNAL>, to see if it may be getting pulled down.  <SIGNAL>SMC_ONOFF</SIGNAL> stable 3.4v even after fan stoped. but it drop down right before it shut off then went back up wile it is booting  after 12 sec fan spinging I get the chime and apple logo. then auto turn off . now nothing connected other tha dc jack as soon connect the magsafe fan spins then after 20 sec auto turn off

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a, shut down by itself after boot starts
threads.message:
Try first starting in SMC bypass mode.

Check if <SIGNAL>3V42_G3H</SIGNAL> is stable when board restarts by itself.
Also monitor <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> and <SIGNAL>SMC_RESET_L</SIGNAL> at same time.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a, shut down by itself after boot starts
threads.message: the board does not restart by itself i tried in smc mode the apple bar got halfway and shut off

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a, shut down by itself after boot starts
threads.message:
So the board turns off, not restart.
Try to clean ME, if you have Medusa programmer.
If not, you can find at least one link to clean BIOS on the forum...

threads.message: What is SMC bypass mode. Plz explain?
